headline: GTA Online
subtitle: More Heist tips from Master Criminals
content:
Some more advice to help you if you are struggling with the Heists:

- Do you have problems with flying? Would you consider yourself aero-nautically challenged? Improve your flying skills at the San Andreas Flight School.
- Lacking some firepower? Ammu-Nation’s latest additions have no rank requirement. Browse the latest DLC stock on the right wall at Ammu-Nation and tool up for the job.
- Be sure to utilize all weapon upgrades – silencers in particular are required for stealth sections.
